queries.query: select count(distinct m.patient_hid) as v1 from medication as m join encounter as e on m.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where month(m.datetime) = :MONTH: and year(m.datetime) = :YEAR: and e.facility_id = :FACILITY: and e.patient_age_months >= 0 and e.patient_age_months <= 11 and m.name = 'BCG';

select count(distinct m.patient_hid) as v1 from medication as m join encounter as e on m.encounter_id = e.encounter_id where month(m.datetime) = :MONTH: and year(m.datetime) = :YEAR: and e.facility_id = :FACILITY: and e.patient_age_months >= 12 and e.patient_age_months <= 23 and m.name = 'BCG';
